class.name: VelocityTracker3D
class.brief_description: Tracks a history of [Vector3] positions to calculate a velocity over a period of time.

method.name: get_tracked_linear_velocity
method.description: Returns the calculated velocity based on the recorded history.

method.name: reset
method.description: Clears recorded history and sets [code]position[/code], along with the current frame, as the start of the new history.

method.name: update_position
method.description: Appends [code]position[/code], along with the current frame, to the position history

members.member: If [code]true[/code], [method Engine.get_physics_frames] will be used to track the frame number.
